name: Weather widget
desc: In this weather app, a user can enter the city name and get the weather information of the particular city from API.[using HTML,CSS,JS]

name: Review Probe Job
desc: A website (and application) for job seekers to find their perfect job, as well as recruiters to find a perfect match for their role and position according to their need with available e-score feature.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A personal portfolio website consists of 'Home', 'About', 'Skills', 'Education', 'Projects', 'Work experience' and 'Contact' section

name: To-Do website
desc: In this website we can add our task list and mark that task as completed or incomplete. Here, we are using Local Storage that will store the task To-Do list in your web browser, So that if you close and restart the browser then also it will display our saved To-Do List

name: Automatic Water Dispenser
desc: In this hardware based project when we will keep our hand infront of IR sensor then it will generate a signal and that signal will receive by relay and relay will activate water pump. Thus, that dispenser can dispense water without the need for manual operation.
